attributes.action: Increase state benefit payments in line with the increased cost of living
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
State benefits are supposed to pay claimants a rate that is sufficient to live on.

However the cost of living is increasing at an alarming rate with basic foodstuffs such as bread, butter, cheese, eggs and milk as well as gas and electricity all essential for human survival becoming more expensive at an exponential rate.

We request the prime minister increase state benefits in line with these cost of living increases so as to continue to provide the vulnerable in our society with enough money to live on
